topic.title: We should create a keylogger for schools
topic.body: Schools in Italy and in the world are too free, we should limit them, because students deserve a better education

topic.title: Smart homes are not so safe by hacking
topic.body: In today's world hackers in a way or another can enter in your Alexa, Siri, Bixby(or whatever Samung called it), Google Home by another device(like your phone) that's connected with them, and so control your house or smart devices. If a casual guy creates something like an exploit for doing this he could control entire smart houses in the world.

1579512965_1JH7GXsReuXYWoJKuREooRvjbWP15.body: That would accomplish the fact that you can't get an F or anything like that

That is what i want because for my parents and probably even other peoples parents take school too seriously(i know that can destroy your life if you search a place to work) at a level were they destroy my things that can cost even â‚¬4000
